text: Bindlach is a municipality in the district of Bayreuth in Upper Franconia in Bavaria, Germany. The town is adjacent immediately north of the town of Bayreuth. The population count of December 2006 was 7197 residents. ==References== ==Other websites== * Bindlach's official Homepage * History of Bindlacher Berg, the former site of the American military base (German text) * Private Homepage about Bindlach, mostly German text Category:Bayreuth (district)
title: Bindlach
